project.name: CBUILDS maven enhanced autoconf project archetype
project.description: Archetype for creating a GNU autoconf software project automated by maven. The GNU coding standard's lifecycle is not as complete as maven's lifecycle. For instance, GNU defines how to make a source release, a compressed tarball, but it does not define a repository to publish the tarball. Also, the SCM release procedures like maven-release-plugin are undefined. Documentation of GNU projects, while thouroughly defined, are outdated compared with maven-site-plugin. So, if you need to write in C, putting maven on top of autoconf gets a more completely implemented and automated project lifecycle.
